mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cover_work_id AS "coverWorkId", d.work_num AS "coverWorkNo", a.address AS "address", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", b.name AS "createByName", a.reason AS "reason", a.imageIds AS "imageIds", a.pass_not_reason AS "passNotReason", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.check_by AS "checkBy", c.name AS "checkByName", a.check_status AS "checkStatus", a.check_date AS "checkDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join sys_user b on a.create_by = b.id left join sys_user c on a.check_by = c.id left join cover_work d on a.cover_work_id= d.id left join cover e on d.cover=e.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exception_report( id, cover_work_id, address, reason, pass_not_reason, create_by, create_date, check_by, check_status, check_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{coverWorkId}, #{address}, #{reason}, #{passNotReason}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{checkBy}, #{checkStatus}, #{checkDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exception_report SET cover_work_id = #{coverWorkId}, address = #{address}, reason = #{reason}, pass_not_reason = #{passNotReason}, check_by = #{checkBy}, check_status = #{checkStatus}, check_date = #{checkDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM exception_report a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
